details:
It was discovered that there was an out-of-bounds buffer read vulnerability
in libvpx, a library implementing the VP8 & VP9 video codecs.


* [CVE-2020-0034](https://security-tracker.debian.org/tracker/CVE-2020-0034)


For Debian 8 Jessie, these problems have been fixed in version
1.3.0-3+deb8u3.


We recommend that you upgrade your libvpx packages.


Further information about Debian LTS security advisories, how to apply
these updates to your system and frequently asked questions can be
found at: <https://wiki.debian.org/LTS>
